name: Purgatory (itch) (Drenaya, arc4t)
description:
Be the first to reach the heaven !

How to play ?

It can played from one to four players

Controls :

Player 1 :   Z-Q-D -- A - E

Player 2 :   Arrows -- 1 - 2  or  Controller 3 -- L1 -  R1

Player 3 :   Controller 1 -- L1 -  R1

Player 4 :   U-H-K -- Y - I  or  Controller 2 -- L1 -  R1

GameJam

This project was entirely made in 3 weeks for the GCC GameJam Godot with the theme "Competitive game".

Authors 
  • Drenaya -  Game designer, Developper
  • Arc4t - Pixel artist
